Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We have attempted to contact you through email and by phone on [INSERT CONTACT DATES] to discuss issues regarding your Copyright registration application. To date, we have not heard from you.

The issues we wanted to discuss with you are:
[INSERT SUMMARY OF PROBLEMS FROM NOTEPAD, NUMBERED]
Please contact us as soon as possible to discuss these issues. Simply reply to this email or call us at (800) 773-0888 Monday–Friday from 6 a.m.–7 p.m. PT.
If we do not hear from you within 60 days of our first attempt to contact you, we may proceed to file your Copyright application as is.
We appreciate you choosing LegalZoom and look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
